attributes.action: Stop Boris Johnson's planned trip to India
attributes.additional_details: India is in the midst of one of the most serious outbreaks of a new variant of the coronavirus. This variant could end up in this country and destroy everything that so many people have worked hard  for during the lockdowns.
attributes.background: Boris Johnson's planned trip to India is unnecessary and dangerous and sends the wrong message to people about what is and is not essential foreign travel
